Title: Torn (1)
Plot: Lingering feelings of rage lead Saul Tigh and Kara Thrace to cause problems aboard Galactica between the survivors from New Caprica and those who stayed with the fleet during the Occupation. Baltar assists the Cylons in an attempt to stay alive and uncovers details about Cylon civilization. A Cylon baseship falls victim to a mysterious disease.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Emilie Ullerup, Alessandro Juliani, Rachel Hayward, Nicki Clyne, Madeline Parker
